resources.string: This application will be used to detect Depression. A set of questions related to functional and cognitive areas will be provided. \n\nIn the end we will provide a score and personal recommend activities to help you reducing depression.
1. Little interest or pleasure in doing things
3. Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much
4. Feeling tired or having little energy
6. Feeling bad about yourself or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down
7. Trouble concentrating on thing, such as reading the newspaper or watching television
8. Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed?
9. Thoughts that you would be better off dead or of hurting yourself in some way?
10. Little interest or pleasure in doing things
